Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been dealing with rough, scaly bumps on my scalp for 10 years.
Have these bumps changed in size, color, or texture over the years?
No, they have remained the same but they recur when I stop my cream treatment.
What type of cream are you using for treatment?
I've been using a topical corticosteroid cream for treatment.
Do you have a personal or family history of any skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis, or allergies?
No, I don't have any personal or family history of skin conditions or allergies.
Have you experienced any other symptoms like itching, bleeding, or pain associated with these bumps?
No, I haven't experienced itching, bleeding, or pain with these bumps.
Final Diagnosis: Lichen Planopilaris
